name: Affiliate Links Expert
author: Maksym Marko

sections.description:
Hello and welcome from the team at Affiliate Links Expert , the ultimate Free WordPress plugin for affiliate marketing.

As a website owner, you know the importance of having a successful affiliate marketing program. With Affiliate Links Expert, you can easily manage all your affiliate data from the admin panel. You can see how many pages were viewed via each affiliate link, how much money each user earned, and you can remove, restore or block users and affiliate links as necessary.

But Affiliate Links Expert is not just for website owners. It’s also for users who want to create affiliate links and share them through social media platforms. With a user account, they can create affiliate links and see all the links they have created. They can also see how much money they earned and how much money the website owner paid them.

You can use Affiliate Links Expert without WooCommerce plugin to create affiliate links and tracking data about visits. However, you cannot track the number of items purchased without the WooCommerce plugin. To track the number of items purchased, use the WooCommerce plugin or integrate your payment methods with the Affiliate Links Expert plugin. For help with the integration, contact the creator of the plugin Maksym Marko or use your own developer.

Let’s take a closer look at the features of Affiliate Links Expert.

First, as a website owner, you have wide control over your affiliate program. You can easily view and manage affiliate data from the admin panel. You can see which users are driving the most traffic to your site and which ones are making the most sales. You can also remove or block users who are not meeting your expectations.

Second, as a user, you have a user-friendly dashboard where you can create and manage your affiliate links. You can easily share your links through social media platforms and track how many people are clicking on them. You can also see how much money you earned and how much you get paid.

Third, Affiliate Links Expert is customizable. You can choose the commission rate for your website and change currency sign on the settings page.

Finally, Affiliate Links Expert is easy to install and use. You can simply download it from the WordPress plugin repository and activate it on your site. Then you need to create a page for partners’ cabinets on your website and place this shortcode [mxalfwp_partner_cabinet] there. This page will be used by your partners for creating affiliate links and visits and payments tracking. You don’t need any coding or technical skills to use it.

You must make payments to partners yourself. Affiliate Links Expert only allows you to set the amount you have already paid in the admin panel. You can contact your partner directly and receive payment details by email.

In conclusion, Affiliate Links Expert is the ultimate Free WordPress plugin for affiliate marketing. Whether you are a website owner or a user, you can easily manage your affiliate data and track your earnings.
sections.installation:
From your WordPress dashboard

  1. Visit ‘Plugins > Add New’
  2. Search for ‘Affiliate Links Expert’
  3. Activate the plugin from your Plugins page.
  4. Create a page for partners’ cabinets on your website and place this shortcode [mxalfwp_partner_cabinet] there.

From WordPress.org

  1. Download ‘Affiliate Links Expert’.
  2. Upload the ‘Affiliate Links Expert’ directory to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory, using your favorite method (ftp, sftp, scp, etc…)
  3. Activate ‘Affiliate Links Expert’ from your Plugins page.
  4. Create a page for partners’ cabinets on your website and place this shortcode [mxalfwp_partner_cabinet] there.
sections.changelog:
2.3

  • Tested up to WP 6.3.

2.2

  • Number format improved.

2.1

  • Tested up to WP 6.2.

2.0

  • Improved functionality. Admin Dashboard. Partner Dashboard. Visit tracking. Payment tracking.

1.0

  • Affiliate Links Expert.
